events.text: Runner, we have prepared a few challenges for you. You may want to [b]dash[/b] to reach clouds far ahead or to escape from things, much in the way you did in your own world.
Although you’re a lowly entity already, you may want to [b]crouch down[/b] to avoid attacks.
[i]Press [wave amp=50 freq=2]shift[/wave] or [wave amp=50 freq=2]C[/wave] to dash in the direction you’re running. Press the [wave amp=50 freq=2]down arrow key[/wave] to crouch[/i]
